name: Sprint 2 Project (aliaftab)
description:
This game user has three options to choose the shapes.

1. Sphere

2. Cube

3. Cylinder

This game user has three options to play around with the shapes.

1. Size

2. Glow

3. Opacity

Users can draw the different shapes and change the color according to their needs. This game is very user-friendly and easy to play. I have added more features to this game. The clock has been added as well which shows the real team when playing the game. This game also has a destroyed function if the user chooses to draw something permanently.
